name: Engage The Crowd
description: Itâ€™s no longer good enough to have a product and expect people to buy it. Today people want to be inspired, they want to feel the same passion you have for your product or idea and they want to believe in your vision of the future. Engage the Crowd is a digital growth agency that helps entrepreneurs change the world by capturing the essence of their vision, catalyzing early stage growth and ultimately empowering their crowd to share in their brand experience.
